participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and dedicated, I enjoy helping animals and contributing to my community.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and energetic, I thrive on challenges and love engaging in physical activities.
participant_2.background: i am a stunt double as my second job. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.
